summary: This is an email exchange between Jack Goldberger and an unnamed recipient regarding a letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News. Goldberger states they will 'deal with the state' and that an addendum has been filed. The email references an attachment named 'Lefkowitz 080917.pdf'.

persons.name: Jack Goldberger
persons.context: Author of the email stating 'We will deal with the state' and confirming an addendum has been filed in relation to a letter concerning Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News.

events.title: Email regarding Epstein letter
events.description: Jack Goldberger sends an email stating 'We will deal with the state' and confirms an addendum has been filed, in response to a forwarded letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News.

keyFacts: The email is dated September 17, 2008, during the period of Epstein's legal troubles in Florida.
Jack Goldberger, a legal correspondent, states 'We will deal with the state,' indicating legal strategy or communication with state authorities regarding Epstein.
An addendum to a legal filing is mentioned as having been filed.
The subject matter involves a letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News.
An attachment named 'Lefkowitz 080917.pdf' is referenced, suggesting involvement or documentation from someone named Lefkowitz.
